title: Deva Devathai Lyrics Amara Kaaviyam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Deva Devathai
Singer(s): K.G.Ranjith, Madhu Iyer
Movie:Â Amara Kaaviyam
Music: M Ghibran

Deva Devathai
Thoovum Poomazhai Vizhudhey Vizhudhey
Dhoora Paayudhey
Oora Paarvaiyil Thodudhey Thodudhey (2)

Unakku Maele Urave
Illai Uyire Uyire.
Uttru Paarthaal
Unake Theriyum Naane Illai.

Saaindhu Pesave, Thevai Or Varam
Saaral Polave Aayiram Sugam.

Kaadhal Soozhum
Paarvaiyodu Kangal Koodume.
Nadakiren Mithakiren
Parakiren udan vanthidu vanthidu.
Saindhidu Serndhidu Ointhidu
En Uyir Kodu Uyir Kodu

Deva Devathai
Thoovum Poomazhai Vizhudhey Vizhudhey
Dhoora Paayudhey
Oora Paarvaiyil Thodudhey Thodudhey (2)

Unakku Maele Urave
Illai Uyire Uyire.
Uttru Paarthaal
Unake Theriyum Naane Illai.

Megam Polave dhegam Aagume
Minnal Thondriye Ennil Paayume

Kaamam Kooda
Kaadhal Aagum Unthan Anbile.
Un Thayakkamum Nerukkamaai Aanadhey
Ada Oru Nodi Oru Nodi.
Thaagamum Mogamum Neeludhey
Ada Ennai Pidi Ennai Pidi

Deva Devathai
Thoovum Poomazhai Vizhudhey Vizhudhey
Dhoora Paayudhey
Oora Paarvaiyil Thodudhey Thodudhey (2)

Uttru Paarthaal
